title: Living Below in This Old Sinful World
lyrics:
Living below
In this old
Sinful world,
Hardly a comfort
Can afford:
Striving alone
To face temptation sore,
Where could I go,
But to the Lord?

CHORUS:
Where could I go,
Oh where could I go,
Seeking a refuge for my soul?
Needing a friend
To help me in the end,
Where could I go
But to the Lord?

Neighbors are kind,
I love them every one,
We get along
In sweet accord;
But when my soul
Needs manna from above,
Where could I go
But to the Lord?

Life here is grand
With friends I love so dear,
Comfort I get
From God's own word;
Yet when I face
The chilling hand of death,
Where could I go
But to the Lord?
